record.title: PERMITTING AMENDMENT NO. 11 TO BE OFFERED AT ANY TIME DURING CONSIDERATION OF H.R. 2446, AFGHANISTAN FREEDOM AND SECURITY SUPPORT ACT OF 2007

speaking.paragraph: Mr. Speaker, I ask unanimous consent that during consideration of H.R. 2446 in the Committee of the Whole, pursuant to House Resolution 453, amendment No. 11 be permitted to be offered at any time.

record.chair: Is there objection to the request of the gentleman from California?
